name: 1" Ceramic Flat Iron with Sonic Vibrating for Less Damage, Dual Voltage Travel Hair Straightener for Women - Ionic & Volcanic Mineral Technology, Straightener and Curler, 10 Heat Settings
short_description: 3D Floating Plates Flat Iron: This ceramic hair straightener is designed with advanced 3D floating plates that feature ultra-fine 0.01mm gaps. Its flexible structure ensures that the hair straightener applies pressure more evenly to your hair. As a result, our hair flat iron reduces pulling and breakage by up to 70%, ensuring smoother glides and salon-quality styles in minutes.

Dual Ionic Technology: Our hair iron straightener features a breakthrough dual ionic technology that fuses negative ions with volcanic minerals like tourmaline and keratin in the hair iron plates. This innovative approach, unlike most conventional straighteners, significantly reduces frizz and locks in moisture. Lab tests prove it reduces cuticle damage by 58%, leaving hair exceptionally smooth and shiny.

Sonic Vibration Mode: With 5,000 high-frequency vibrations per second, YeCheer hair straighteners for women gently shakes the plates as you style, reducing hair tugging and breakage while ensuring even heat and effortless glide. Enjoy faster, smoother styling and sleeker results. Tip: Press the power button once while on to activate vibration mode.

10 Precise Heat Settings: This flat iron hair straightener features 10 adjustable heat settings (280°F–450°F) and a digital LED display for real-time temperature. Heats up in 20 seconds and reaches max temperature in 40 seconds. Multiple settings make it suitable for all hair types, from fine to coarse.

User-Friendly Design: Every detail is crafted for your comfort. The ergonomic curved handle reduces wrist fatigue during long styling sessions, while the rounded tip helps prevent accidental burns. The 6.5 ft 360° swivel cord of the straightener flat iron offers styling freedom, and the 1×4.5 inch volcanic mineral ceramic plate is the ideal universal size. Plus, worldwide voltage compatibility ensures you can enjoy perfect styling anywhere you travel.

2-Year YeCheer Care: We offer a 2-year worry-free period for every YeCheer flat iron user. During this time, you’re fully protected against any product damage or defects. Package Includes: Flat iron, protective glove, user manual, 2*hair clips.

name: TYMO Flat Iron Hair Straightener - Titanium Hair Straighteners for Women, 1 Inch Professional Travel Flat Iron, Portable Straightener and Curlers with 10s Heat Up, 32 Temp, Dual Voltage & LED Display
short_description: 150% SMOOTHER - Featuring advanced titanium plates enriched with argan oil and keratin coating, the TYMO flat iron hair straightener delivers 150% smoother glide than ceramic plates while boosting hair health - achieving 89% More Shine, 2x Less Breakage and 98% Frizz-Free results. This innovative straightener ensures effortless styling without snagging or breakage.

STRAIGHTEN & CURL - The TYMO hair straighteners for women features 1 inch 3D floating plates with rounded edges, effortlessly transform hair into any style - from sleek straight locks to bouncy blowout waves, romantic loose curls, or defined spiral curls - all with natural movement and zero creases, unlike traditional straighteners that leave awkward kinks.

EASY & TRAVEL FRIENDLY - Featuring smart Motion-sense Tech, the TYMO titanium flat iron curling iron in one activates with a simple shake and auto-shuts off after 5 minutes for safety. With universal 100-240V compatibility and a 360°tangle-free swivel cord, the TYMO hair straightener and curler 2 in 1 is ideal for worldwide travel.

10s HEAT UP - The TYMO hair curlers reaches optimal temperature in just 10 seconds using professional-grade MCH heating technology - 3 times faster than conventional PTC systems. This innovation reduces styling time while maintaining consistent heat to prevent thermal damage.

32 TEMP PRECISION SETTINGS - With 32 adjustable settings (140-450°F) and 30x/sec precision calibration, the TYMO hair tools intelligently maintains ideal heat to protect moisture, enhance shine, and prevent damage while the LED display ensures perfect temperature control for healthier styling.
